name: openswitchmapslimex
description: Switch map services and Tools for OpenStreetMap contributors

scripts.dev: parcel watch src/manifest.json src/popup.html src/options.html src/background.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && sh inc_patch.sh && parcel build src/manifest.json src/popup.html src/options.html src/background.js && cp src/icon128.png dist/ && cp src/icon128-no.png dist/ && node deploy.js

author: limex
